After Saawariya, Salman Khan & Sanjay Leela Bhansali Are Coming Together For 'Inshallah'
After Saawariya, Salman Khan & Sanjay Leela Bhansali Are Coming Together For 'Inshallah'
Filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali's vision was to cast Salman Khan in Bajirao Mastani alongside Aishwarya Rai. He tried convincing him for 15 years but the equation between Aishwarya and Salman were so sour that there was no room for reconciliation.
Ultimately, Sanjay Leela Bhansali had to move on with a new pair Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh and he couldn't be more grateful. The jodi turned out to be mega hit in every film.
Twitter
But Sanjay's wish was to always get Salman Khan back on board. After Saawariya, where Sallu mian played a guest cameo, the actor is all set to collaborate with Sanjay leela Bhansali for an upcoming film.
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES 812 SHARES
This Bollywood project is a first on a lot of levels. Not only, Salman Khan is reuniting with SLB after 20 long years, the filmmaker is getting Alia Bhatt on board too.
Facebook
The magical duo are coming together for Inshallah and w couldn't be happier. The soon to be on-screen couple broke the news on Twitter.
It’s been 20 years but I am glad Sanjay and I are finally back in his next film, Inshallah. Looking forward to work with Alia and inshallah we will all be blessed on this journey.#Inshallah #SLB @aliaa08 @bhansali_produc @SKFilmsOfficial — Salman Khan (@BeingSalmanKhan) March 19, 2019
I was 9 when I first walked into Sanjay Leela Bhansali's office, all nervous and hoping and praying that I would be in his next film. It's been a long wait. — Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) March 19, 2019
Dream with your eyes wide open they say & I did. Sanjay Sir and Salman Khan are magical together & I can't wait to join them on this beautiful journey called “Inshallah” ❤#Inshallah #SLB @BeingSalmanKhan @bhansali_produc @SKFilmsOfficial @prerna982 — Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) March 19, 2019
Alia couldn't help but reminisce her days when she walked into Sanjay leela Bhansali's office and dreamt of featuring in his next film. Looking at the pairing, Twitter had a filed day.
Who would've thought they will work together as a lead pair. 😂 #Inshallah pic.twitter.com/nTw6DlHuTw — Sky! (@being_Akash_) March 19, 2019
Sanjay Leela Bhansali made one of the biggest budgeted grand films like #BajiraoMastani & #Padmaavat with actor like RanveerSingh then imagine what will he do with THE SALMAN KHAN.
It is guaranteed 2020s biggest movie. You simply can't question SLB's potential. #Inshallah pic.twitter.com/xVxfvh4AX2 — . (@BeingRohan_) March 19, 2019
Sanjay Leela Bhansali made one of the biggest budgeted grand films like #BajiraoMastani & #Padmaavat with actor like RanveerSingh then imagine what will he do with THE SALMAN KHAN.
It is guaranteed 2020s biggest movie. You simply can't question SLB's potential. #Inshallah pic.twitter.com/xVxfvh4AX2 — . (@BeingRohan_) March 19, 2019
looks like they've broken the bollywood internet with the announcement 😹 #Inshallah pic.twitter.com/vCQ7L7sw46 — Hud Hud Dabangg (@HudHud_Dabangg) March 19, 2019
The movie is slated to release in 2020.
